description: Introduction and sale of products via live streaming.

examples.chinese: 直播带货已经成为中国电商行业的新热潮
examples.translation: Livestream selling has become a new trend in China's e-commerce

examples.chinese: 知名网红做直播带货,一个月卖了100万的服装
examples.translation: Famous influencer sold 1 million in clothes via livestream
